title: Riot
body: Why Riot has suspended a lot of accountsï¼ŸMost people know

replies.body: probs cause they break the rules
why are you complaining? you got something to hide son?
Scamming, boosting etc. Had a guy scam off me one time and a week later his account didn't even exist. Turns out I heard form a friend his account was fully wiped / removed from League
If someone breaks the rules, they get punished. If they break the rules repeatedly or to extreme magnitude, they get banned. It's quite simple really.
